metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21137 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In several methods of JobStore.java, uncaught exceptions in job map parsing could lead to local persistent denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-246541702

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
